hero.title: Finding Spaces That Inspire Modern World in Dubai
hero.subtitle: With years of experience in the market, we specialize in helping clients sell their properties quickly and at the best possible price, ensuring a smooth and successful transaction from start to finish

areas.title: These are popular locations to live in Dubai
areas.description: Discover the most attractive neighborhoods in Dubai, each offering a unique lifestyle, convenient amenities, and excellent investment potential.
areas.pageDescription: Explore all the amazing neighborhoods in Dubai. Each area offers unique opportunities for living and investment.

aboutUs.title: Discover Our Journey to Real Estate Excellence
aboutUs.description1: ForYou Real Estate has evolved from a small local agency into a leading real estate firm known for its innovative approach and exceptional service in Dubai's luxury property market.
aboutUs.description2: Our team combines extensive market experience with a passion for excellence, aiming to exceed expectations while maintaining a strong commitment to our clients' success and satisfaction.
aboutUs.stat2: Years of expertise in Dubai real estate market
aboutUs.heroDescription: We believe that real estate is more than just creating buildings it's about shaping experiences, fostering connections & enhancing communities.
aboutUs.milestonesDescription: At ForYou, our journey reflects vision, growth, and a steadfast commitment to excellence.

milestone2022.description: By 2022, ForYou had completed its first major project. This project was a testament to our innovative approach and commitment to quality, earning us early recognition in the industry.

milestone2023.description: In 2023, we significantly expanded our team, bringing in diverse talents and expertise. Our team's growth has been crucial in continuing to deliver high-quality, innovative solutions.

milestone2024.description: In 2024, we expanded our presence in the Dubai real estate market, establishing key partnerships and launching multiple successful projects that set new industry standards.

milestone2025.description: As we look to the future, ForYou remains committed to innovation, excellence, and sustainability. We are excited about upcoming projects and opportunities to further our impact in the world of real estate.

aboutUs.teamDescription: Meet the talented individuals who drive our company's success with their dedication, expertise, and passion for innovation.
aboutUs.officeDescription: Visit us at our office in Dubai. Schedule a meeting to discuss your real estate needs with our expert team.

artem.name: Artem Gerasimov
artem.description: 15 years of experience in Russian and international companies within the financial and banking sectors. Extensive background in working with high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs), including asset management, investment advisory, and business development. Proven track record of building trusted client relationships, growing portfolios, and delivering tailored financial solutions in a highly competitive environment.

nikita.name: Nikita Dyakov
nikita.description: Over 10 years of experience in the financial sector. Gained experience working in both Russian and international companies such as Citibank and Alfa-Bank, where he worked with high-net-worth clients, and Alfa Asset Management Europe (Luxembourg), where he held the position of Business Development Director.

antony.name: Antony
antony.description: 7+ years of experience in organizing events for international audiences in Russia and the UAE. Planned and executed a wide range of corporate, cultural, and lifestyle events tailored to expatriate communities, with a strong emphasis on cross-cultural communication, partnership development, and brand visibility. Over 4 years of experience in business and real estate across Russia and Dubai. Actively involved in property transactions, market analysis, and investment consulting. Built and managed relationships with clients and partners in both regions, contributing to business growth and successful deal closures in dynamic and competitive markets.

gulnoza.name: Gulnoza
gulnoza.description: 3.5+ years of experience in the Dubai real estate market, with a strong focus on client relations and strategic partnerships. Successfully worked with high-net-worth individuals, international investors, and key business partners to facilitate property transactions, provide tailored investment solutions, and build long-term trust-based relationships.

faq.question: What types of properties do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer a wide range of properties including off-plan developments, secondary market properties, apartments, villas, penthouses, and townhouses across Dubai.

faq.question: How can I schedule a viewing?
faq.answer: You can schedule a viewing by filling out the contact form on our website, calling us directly, or visiting our office. Our team will be happy to arrange a convenient time for you.

faq.question: Do you assist with property financing?
faq.answer: Yes, we work with trusted financial partners to help our clients find the best financing options. We can assist with mortgage applications and connect you with reputable banks in the UAE.

faq.question: What areas in Dubai do you cover?
faq.answer: We cover all major areas in Dubai including Downtown Dubai, Dubai Marina, Business Bay, JVC, Palm Jumeirah, and many other premium locations. Visit our Areas page to see all available locations.

faq.question: Can I buy property as a foreigner?
faq.answer: Yes, Dubai allows foreigners to own freehold properties in designated areas. Our team can guide you through the entire process and help you understand all legal requirements.

projectImage.title: Golf Edge by Emaar
projectImage.description: Golf Edge, located in Emaar South, is a luxurious residential project that offers a peaceful retreat amidst picturesque surroundings. Nestled among green hills, lush fairways, and golf courses, the homes at Golf Edge seamlessly blend in with the serene environment, creating an exclusive sanctuary for its residents.
